name: Cathedral
description: A magnificent cathedral serves as the center of religious authority and architectural wonder, offering spiritual guidance and political influence, but the concentration of religious power can create both protection and oppression. The combination of faith and politics creates complex social dynamics and opportunities for advancement.
atmosphere: Towering stone arches soar overhead while colored light streams through stained glass windows. Deep organ notes reverberate through the vast space. The rich scent of incense and polished wood fills the air. Cold stone floors stretch between rows of wooden pews.
